long_description: A compact flashlight that packs a lot of power into an easy-to-carry design, the Maglite XL200 LED Flashlight boasts a long-lasting LED bulb and 5 versatile settings. Modes includes High Power, Strobe Mode, Nite Lite(TM), Signal Mode and SOS mode; Lockout switch prevents accidental mode change. Proprietary QuickClick method lets you scroll through 5 lighting modes by continuously clicking the tailcap switch. Adjust the LED beam from Spot to Flood with a simple twist. Anodized aluminum case resists corrosion and water. Maglite XL200 LED Flashlight includes 3 AAA batteries for a runtime of 218 hrs. on low, 2.5 hrs. on high. 4.8 in. length is easy to carry in a jacket or pack pocket.
short_description: A compact flashlight that packs a lot of power into an easy-to-carry design, the Maglite XL200 LED Flashlight boasts a long-lasting LED bulb and 5 versatile settings.
